Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.shapes.GeometricShape

  • public class Circle
extends EllipseLike
    Type of Ellipse that has equals horizontal and vertical radii.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle(int x,
              int y,
              int radius)
        Creates a circle at given coordinates with given radius. Throws IllegalArgumentException if radius is less than 1.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - y coordinate of the center of the circle
        radius - radisu of the circle
